ComicInfo.Summary: As Spawn and the Violator battle in the sewers, a water main ruptures and washes them away. Violator, worried by Spawn's rapidly developing armor, enlists Wynn to help him destroy Spawn. He advises Wynn to befriend Terry while leaning on his family, hoping to enrage Spawn and make him vulnerable. Cog urges Spawn to think before he acts, lest he be goaded into a foolhardy attack.
ComicInfo.Teams: New York Police Department,Central Intelligence Agency,Hellspawn
ComicInfo.Title: Ripples
